alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:24PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Converse County through 900 PM MDT... At 823 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Teapot Rock, or 32 miles northeast of Casper, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Converse County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
